title: David Castilla
text:
David Castilla (born 6 July 1977) is a retired French <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">goalkeeper</a>.
He played for <a href="OGC%20Nice">OGC Nice</a>, <a href="FC%20Nantes">FC Nantes</a>, <a href="Ayr%20United%20F.C.">Ayr United F.C.</a> and not France Under 21s (44 league games and eight cup games), <a href="US%20Cr%C3%A9teil">US Créteil</a> and <a href="AS%20Beauvais">AS Beauvais</a>.
